title: Study on the impact of battery pack arrangement on temperature uniformity distribution
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4519-4532
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00459K, Paper
ZhongXing Ji, Chao Zhang
Optimizing structural parameters (channel width, inclination angle, cell gap) improves lithium-ion battery pack thermal performance, enhancing safety and extending lifespan.
